    @allure.title('Test - create static system group, create static group members , display the system group and check this group can\'t be deleted')
    def test_create_group_static(self,base_api):
        # create a static system group
        response = base_api.create(endpoint,file_paths['static'],need_random=True, field="name")
        assert response.status_code == 200
        static_group_id = response.json()['_id']
    
        #  create a static group member to this group
        member_endpoint = 'static-group-member'
        json_data = load_json(file_paths["member"])
        json_data["groupId"] = static_group_id
    
        json_data["orgId"] = ENV_CONFIG[base_api.env]["orgId"]
    
        response_member = base_api.create_with_jsondata(member_endpoint,json_data,need_random=False, field=None)
        member_id = response_member.json()['_id']
        assert response_member.status_code == 200
    
        # get static system group with member info
        response_static_group = base_api.get_by_id(endpoint,static_group_id)
        assert response_static_group.status_code == 200
        # assert response_static_group.json()['members'][0]['_id'] == member_id
        #    will add compare all the  response_static_group['members'][0] with response_member
            # delete the group
        response_delete= base_api.delete(endpoint,params,static_group_id)
        assert response_delete.status_code == 403
